elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Make a note of the specific demands on Martin for each stakeholder group.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Customers
elements.correctAnswer: Expect a wide range of drinks at fair prices.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Employees
elements.correctAnswer: Expect attractive working hours, fair wages, social benefits, job security.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Suppliers
elements.correctAnswer: Expect regular orders, punctual payment of the invoice.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Wangen Savings and Loan Association
elements.correctAnswer: Expects punctual payment of interest and repayment of the loan in 2 years.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Make a note of the specific demands on Martin for each stakeholder group.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Competition
elements.correctAnswer: Expect fair treatment of each other.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Equity provider
elements.correctAnswer: Expect a profit soon and therefore a positive return on their investment.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: State
elements.correctAnswer: Expects compliance with laws regarding opening hours, night-time rest periods, etc.
